title: Lag
body:
So, hey, (first thread)
roughly at 3:15 (AEST, melbourne ish time), My entire team dc'd at the same time. half of the other team also dc'd. There was a bit of lag just a few minutes after everyone re-connected. Im not coming here to report anything, so pls dont tell me to report it, no video or anything of it.
Did anyone else get this lag at the same time?

replies.body: Yeah yesterday was bad, I was spectating a lot of games and in about 90% of them there was at least one disconnect.

Same here, it also happened around 6:35pm Cairns Time.

I am also experiancing and excruciatingly immense ammount of lag, I says my ping is 60- like always, but it feels like it's around 200-500 :/

Not to mention, enemies are practically teleporting behind me and killing me, and running off being my client is updated, leaving me to think nothing happened then all of a sudden I'm dead.
Packet loss is probably what you are experiencing.
Not just me, im most of my games yesterday, most people where also complaining of lag.

Its happening to me but only when I'm dominating the enemy team then I will lag and freeze and disconnect. As soon as the one enemy champion is not around me lag is gone. Mana vanishes randomly without casting ability. rake up the minion kills but gaining no gold. no bonus such as heal +6 are being counted. ability 400+ can't do any dmg to enemy team. Join new game lag gone, don't dominate no lag. I think its more suspicious, yet lol never admits something is wrong or going on or does anything about it. I have IP boost on and not gaining extra ip as well. LOL there is something seriously WRONG
Yeah 3:15 matches up with the time in my game that it happened.
